result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael B. ERHARDT was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Manitowoc County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Reimburse Manitowoc County for attorney fees.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael B. ERHARDT

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Case Status Change and Discharge from DOC indicating that defendant was terminated from probation effective 05-08-2016

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Payment Plan requested for monthly payment of $50.00; payment plan documents filed with case.

Petition and Order for Payment of Attorney Fees signed by MRR on 05-18-2015.
Voucher 15-068, in the amount of $434.00, sent to the Manitowoc County Comptroller on 05-19-2015.
Copies of Petition and Order mailed to defendant and counsel on 05-19-2015.
The action has concluded on this case and the Court-appointed counsel is removed effective 05-18-2015.
Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 03-12-15 at 9:15 a.m.  State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.  Minutes
Order Appointing Attorney Adam Snavely as counsel of record through Manitowoc County.

Defendant informs the Court that he has a court appointed attorney in Sheboygan County.  Court will change his opinion and appoint counsel.  Adam Snavely present and will take the case.   Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 01-21-15 at 2:30 p.m.   
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael B. ERHARDT
Current: 1309 Dewey Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 01-09-2015)
Prior: 730 Georgia Avenue #a, Sheboygan, WI 53081

Petition for Appointment of Counsel;  Affidavit of Indigency.
Order denying the petition because the defendant is not indigent.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 01-12-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
